name: Avoid unreferenced Main procedures (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all the PL1 Main Procedures that are not referenced i.e. not called.
output:
The report lists all the unreferenced PL1 Main Procedures. 

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Main Procedures full name
rationale: Unreferenced artifacts like any other example of dead code makes maintenance more difficult and more expensive (modification of unused code).
total: Number of the PL1 Main Procedures.
